Reviews.Title: “Stylish Hotel, Great location, Disinterested staff”
Reviews.Author: Scottstache
Reviews.Content: renovations nice style liked decor nice breakfast provided staffs personality severely lacking werent rude aloof disinterested interacting males acted bothering night waited 15 minutes male staffer phone assistance stood times mouthed help ignored laughed chatted exception ana maps offered assistance bad dont staff women fine cute hotel quiet street id pluses board staff nicer little helpful hotel main street location 10 minute walks lot main sites 5 minutes walk fro piazzas filled restaurants

Reviews.Title: “ideal hotel”
Reviews.Author: ballyp
Reviews.Content: recently stayed mother found hotel ideal location walking distance tourist attractions hotel staff friendly helpful appointed bathroom lovely clean efficient breakfast feast excellent choice ample supply fuel day ahead loved choice restaurants bars street minutes excellent value hotel definately stay return rome

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern boutique hotel in a great neighborhood.”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights husband ample size bathroom size italy hotel issues consistent hot water drain shower flowing fast overall experience clean arrived straightened day didnt clean change sheets everyday wouldnt expected day night stay nice enjoyed stay stay breakfast excellent meal day except night location perfect campo de fiori charming neighborhood fell love shops fun bars cafes friendly locals hotel minute walk piazza navona twenty minute walk colosseum maybe 30 minutes spanish steps cant wait
